word: IT IS NOT THE PURPOSE OF THIS BOOK TO PASS JUDGMENT ON THE POPULAR REVIVALS OF TODAY. WHO CAN DOUBT THAT THERE ARE GENUINE CONVERSIONS AT SOME OF THESE MEETINGS? IN FACT, WE WILL GO A STEP FURTHER AND SUGGEST THAT GENUINE HEALING MAY RESULT FROM THE EXERCISE OF FAITH IN GOD'S WORD. IN SOME CASES THIS MAY BE IN SPITE OF THE EVANGELIST, NOT NECESSARILY BECAUSE OF HIM. IT IS THE PURPOSE OF THIS BOOK, RATHER, TO CONSIDER CERTAIN CRITERIA THAT HELP ONE TO DISTINGUISH BETWEEN THE TRUE AND THE FALSE.
